member.name: T:CreditCardIdentifier.Validator
member.summary:
Credit Card BIN Validator
This class provides credit card validation using bin-cc data.

member.name: M:CreditCardIdentifier.Validator.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Path to brands.json. If null, uses bundled data.

member.name: M:CreditCardIdentifier.Validator.FindBrand(System.String)
member.returns: Brand name or null if not found

member.name: M:CreditCardIdentifier.Validator.IsSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Check if card number is supported

member.summary: Validate CVV for a specific brand

member.name: M:CreditCardIdentifier.Validator.GetBrandInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Get information about a specific brand
member.returns: Brand information or null if not found
